name: The Colosseum Showdown Pro v2
description:
Theme based on TeamPokeaim's Showdown Pro (https://userstyles.org/styles/186996/showdown-pro-v4-03-battle-stadium-edition-beta) and LauraQZ's pokeaimMD Skin (https://userstyles.org/styles/180146/pokeaimmd-skin-pokemon-showdown).

A near-complete appearance overhaul based around the Colosseum Draft League.

Most of the UI changes are based on The Colosseum Google Sheets templates.

For more information please refer to the Colosseum moderators!
additional_info:
v1.01 - Fixed text colour in Dark mode, removed move button colour override

v2 - New Showdown Calculator theme

v2.1 - Fixed broken Multi-battle/FFA layout
